name: Aquarium (itch) (Nandini25)
description:
Ever wanted to own an aquarium? Well now you can! A simple yet strategic card set making game which is fun for all ages.

Make sets of different fish and balance them out when someone or you yourself decide to reveal the Aquarium.  Make sure the Big fish don't overpower your smaller fishes and eat them up. You wont score any points when that happens. Try getting the most similar fish possible for additional bonuses. Wild cards can be used for any small fish so get those big sequences going. 

With average round playtime lasting 10-15 minutes and your games having 4+ rounds, you are in for hours of fun.  

Playing Link: https://screentop.gg/@Skye73/FishAquarium

A fun-filled set making game created on ScreenTop during Game Jam workshop Dec 2020 in Srishti Institute, Bangalore. 

Credits to the team:
